channel.title: Xp Help
channel.description: IN delta how would i change the amount of xp people get when that atk a npc

item.title: Xp Help
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

[quote=“JCor9, post:3, topic:300853”]double TotalExp = 0;
if (UseBow || UseCrossBow) {
TotalExp = (double)(120hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), 4);
} else if (FightType != 3) {
TotalExp = (double)(120hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID);
} else {
TotalExp = (double)(50hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength);
}
TotalExp = (double)(50hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints);
attackTimer = 7;

IS this what i need if so what do i change[/quote]

the *hitdiff

Read full topic

item.title: Xp Help
item.dc:creator: @JCor9 JCor9
item.description:
@JCor9 wrote:

double TotalExp = 0;
if (UseBow || UseCrossBow) {
TotalExp = (double)(120hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), 4);
} else if (FightType != 3) {
TotalExp = (double)(120hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID);
} else {
TotalExp = (double)(50hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength);
}
TotalExp = (double)(50hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints);
attackTimer = 7;

IS this what i need if so what do i change
